rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.

The segment neutrally describes contract terms and triggers ('includes options to accelerate the development timeline if needed, based on an increase in human cases, the severity of cases or human-to-human transmission of the virus').
The segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports contract details and does not contain an explicit calming cue.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation or statement of uncertainty/low risk.
The segment states the contract includes options to accelerate development, describing a capability/plan.
